item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (99 points | 32 comments)
2. Solarpunk (54 points | 9 comments)
3. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (78 points | 22 comments)
4. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (173 points | 44 comments)
5. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (199 points | 61 comments)
6. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (118 points | 89 comments)
7. CSS Custom Functions are coming (39 points | 33 comments)
8. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (187 points | 69 comments)
9. ACCESS.bus: The Forgotten USB Competitor (24 points | 3 comments)
10. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (102 points | 63 comments)
11. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (168 points | 163 comments)
12. Schools reviving shop class (116 points | 75 comments)
13. Matt's Script Archive (1995) (62 points | 31 comments)
14. Turning my ESP32 into a DNS sinkhole to fight doomscrolling (57 points | 12 comments)
15. Kaspersky exposes hidden malware on GitHub stealing personal data (30 points | discuss)
16. Show HN: Prompting LLMs in Bash scripts (20 points | 1 comment)
17. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (96 points | 70 comments)
18. Gödel's theorem debunks the most important AI myth – Roger Penrose [video] (70 points | 143 comments)
19. Imec demonstrates electrical yield for 20nm lines High NA EUV single patterning (18 points | 5 comments)
20. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (122 points | 146 comments)
21. Verifiable science on modified PCR machine (34 points | 8 comments)
22. Distro (YC S24) is hiring a marketing lead in Palo Alto ( | hide)
23. Most IT companies fail to serve security.txt for RFC 9116 in 2025 (18 points | 6 comments)
24. Rotors: A practical introduction for 3D graphics (2023) (13 points | discuss)
25. Raspberry Pi Pico audio player (118 points | 27 comments)
26. A mechanically verified garbage collector for OCaml [pdf] (11 points | discuss)
27. Google does not want rights to things you do using Chrome (2008) (131 points | 64 comments)
28. olduse.net (108 points | 14 comments)
29. Show HN: Recommendarr – AI Driven Recommendations Based on Sonarr/Radarr Media (59 points | 32 comments)
30. Show HN: Fast Transition from Firefox to Librewolf (52 points | 21 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
